title: How Governments Use Propaganda & Subsidies to Create A Health Care Crisis
author: Natalie Bohin
cleaned_text: Americans are in the midst of a health crisis. With rising obesity rates, [millions of people suffer from cardiovascular disease ](https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2019/01/190131084238.htm), and a host of our other problems due to poor diet, lack of exercise, and overuse of antibiotic drugs. You see it all over the news, and maybe you have friends, family, or even you may deal with different chronic health conditions. The average American consumes more than the recommended amount of [sodium, saturated fat, refined grains, and calories ](https://www.hhs.gov/fitness/resource-center/facts-and-statistics/index.html). Right now, human health is an issue, yet why do governments heavily subsidize foods in the meat and dairy industry? Over the last several decades, the government has used propaganda and food subsidies to push certain products, but at what cost?
